response.overview: China Dream of Labour Beauty-2024 May Day "Heart to Heart" special program takes "start to the "new" as the main line, with the majority of the working masses as the protagonist. Through a variety of presentations, it reflects the pace of every worker "walks very solid", "walks very powerfully", "walks brilliantly" and "walks confidently", advocates and promotes the spirit of model workers, the spirit of labour and craftsman, and sings the main melody of the glory of labour and the great struggle.
response.title: China Dream - Beauty of Labour
